definition: to stay behind to take care of things
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining
detachment left to provide covering fire
pinyin: huo3 chang3 liu2 shou3 fen1 dui4

definition: "left-behind children", rural children whose parents have to make a living as migrant workers in distant urban areas, but cannot afford to keep the family with them

sentences.english: There was no significant difference in self- concept between two sub -groups with different age in left -behind children.
sentences.chinese: 不同年齡組留守兒童的自我意識比較無顯著性差異。

sentences.english: As for the few thousand people who insisted on staying behind, he called them "hard-headed".
sentences.chinese: 他把堅持留守的幾千名民衆稱爲“頑固派”。

sentences.english: The main problem is that Sagittarius does not like remaining on one place and aspires to independence.
sentences.chinese: 主要的問題在於，射手不喜歡留守原位，並渴望獨立。

sentences.english: One of those who remained was Jacqueline Harris, who spoke to local television station KHOU.
sentences.chinese: 哈里斯女士是堅持留守的人之一。

sentences.english: The problem of left-behind children is essentially the absence of family education.
sentences.chinese: 留守兒童問題本質上是家庭教育的缺失。

sentences.english: About 561 parent-absent children took part in the study.
sentences.chinese: 研究以有效樣本爲561名的留守兒童爲被試。

sentences.english: Xia Youhao, deputy principal of Mingde Elementary School, prepares lunch for "left-behind" children in Tongling City.
sentences.chinese: 銅陵市明德小學行政校長夏友浩爲留守兒童準備午餐。

sentences.english: Should wives with children be housebound?
sentences.chinese: 有小孩的太太們應該留守家裏嗎？

sentences.english: I did not expect that the evening of 27, staying in Jinan tuco almost Zousi.
sentences.chinese: 沒想到的是，27日晚，留守濟南的圖科幾乎被揍死。

sentences.english: My friend went afar to work, so he asked me to take care of the courtyard in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 朋友去遠方做事，把他在山中的庭院交給我留守。

sentences.english: AC Milan wunderkind, Alexandre Pato recently reaffirmed his commitment to the Rossoneri after he pledged to remain true to his current contract.
sentences.chinese: 米蘭神童帕託日前剛剛表示過會遵守合同，留守米蘭。

sentences.english: The third part is about analyzing the forming reasons of the left-behind students' moral character problems.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是對影響農村留守學生品德狀況的因素分析。

sentences.english: But there are 50 staff left-behind nuclear plants.
sentences.chinese: 但是卻有50名工作人員留守核電站。

sentences.english: After that, she'll go back to work and I'll stay home.
sentences.chinese: 三個月之後，她將回到工作中去，而我會留守在家。

sentences.english: Many of us have heard about the so-called left-behind children.
sentences.chinese: 許多人都聽到過所謂的留守兒童一詞。

sentences.english: Staycations are super popular now because of the economy;
sentences.chinese: 由於經濟不景氣，留守假期如今非常受熱捧。

definition: (of troops stationed in a strategic area) to defend/(fig.) to stand guard/to protect
to garrison/to stand guard/on garrison duty
to stand a siege/trapped in a besieged city
to retreat and defend/to withdraw and maintain one's guard
to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining
